Text:
Could you please reseed this just long enough for me to get it and then I'll seed it pretty much continuously? It says I've been trying to download this for ten weeks and three days, which obviously is more than two and a half months. I'm only at seventeen and a half percent.

My computer is almost always on, and like I said, since this is in such terrible need of seeders, I will continuously seed it whenever my computer is on, which is usually always. I'm doing that currently with another file that took forever to get, one called "Zillion - Let It Rock!". Just please seed this long enough for me to get the rest of it so I can do that. It would be much appreciated.
